column4: : i am not sure , i do upgrade regulalry ..the system was working well and fine , the last time i used. and when i swiutched on and booted my system today , struck to it

you might want to try to login to grub using an older kernel (not the top default option); if you get in, try system -> admin -> gparted to repartition your swap (what is the device in question, swap or your OS partition)?
: its saying check root =bootarg cat /proc/cmdline or missing modules , devices: cat /proc/modules ls /dev
ok, sorry i don't know how to fix that, maybe others here might
